text: The Commissioner Karachi Division is a Senior Officer in the Pakistan Administrative Services usually of the elite rank of BS-21 (Grade 21).THE SINDH LOCAL GOVERNMENT ORDINANCE, 2001 Commissioner Karachi Division is considered to be one of the most senior positions in the Government of Sindh. the Commissioner of Karachi is Mr. Iftikhar Ali Shallwani an Officer of the Pakistan Administrative Service with elite rank of BS-21 / Grade 21.The Commissioners of Sindh List ==See also== * Karachi Development Authority * Karachi Metropolitan Corporation * Commissioners of Sind in British India * Mayor of Karachi ==References== ==External links== * Commissioner of Karachi Category:Commissioners of Karachi
title: Commissioner Karachi
